lexa.core.data

Class ConfigData

  • java.lang.Object
    • lexa.core.data.ConfigData
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class ConfigData
extends java.lang.Object
    A container for a SimpleDataSet as configuration.
    This is used for loading and parsing configuration items. Once read, the object should be closed to ensure that all items have been read.
    This class is deprecated and developers should use ConfigDataSet instead.
    Since:
    2012-07
    Author:
    William

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigData

        public ConfigData(DataSet data)
           throws DataException
        Deprecated. 
        Create a new configuration.

        The ConfigData will contain all the elements in the data set. The current path of the configuration is set to root.

        Parameters:
        data - a DateSet containing the configuration data.
        Throws:
        DataException - The data is null or empty.

      • ConfigData

        public ConfigData(DataSet data,
                  java.lang.String path)
           throws DataException
        Deprecated. 
        Create a new configuration.

        The ConfigData will contain all the elements in the data set.

        Parameters:
        data - a DateSet containing the configuration data.
        path - the path for the configuration.
        Throws:
        DataException - The path is null or empty, or the data is null or empty.

      • ConfigData

        private ConfigData(DataSet data,
                   ConfigData parent,
                   java.lang.String block)
            throws DataException
        Deprecated. 
        Create a new configuration.

        The ConfigData will contain all the elements in the data set.

        Parameters:
        data - A DateSet containing the configuration data.
        parent - The parent that contained the configuration.
        block - The block within the parent where the configuration comes from
        Throws:
        DataException - The block is null or empty, or the data is null or empty.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
           throws DataException
        Deprecated. 
        Close the configuration after reading.
        Throws:
        DataException - All the configuration items have not been read.

      • close

        private void close(java.lang.String key)
            throws DataException
        Deprecated. 
        Close a child block of the configuration.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to the block.
        Throws:
        DataException - The block has already been closed.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String key)
        Deprecated. 
        Checks if the ConfigData contains a named key.

        Checks each SimpleDataItem and sees if its key is the same as the named key.

        Parameters:
        key - A key for a SimpleDataItem.
        Returns:
        true if a SimpleDataItem exists with the named key, otherwise false.

      • getAll

        public DataSet getAll()
               throws DataException
        Deprecated. 
        Gets all the data in this config block and all sub-blocks.

        This effectively removes all the config and marks it as read.

        NB Calling this method circumvents all checks on if the data is being used or not. This should only be used where ALL data is acceptable.

        Returns:
        all the data in this config block and all sub-blocks.
        Throws:
        DataException - Unable to iterate the configuration.

      • getConfigData

        public ConfigData getConfigData(java.lang.String key)
                         throws DataException
        Deprecated. 
        Get a configuration block from the configuration.

        Gets the sub-block for the named key.

        Parameters:
        key - The key that identifies the block.
        Returns:
        The block represented by key
        Throws:
        DataException - The block does not exist within the configuration.

      • getItem

        public DataItem getItem(java.lang.String key)
                 throws DataException
        Deprecated. 
        Get a configuration item from the configuration.

        Gets the SimpleDataItem for the named key.

        Parameters:
        key - The key that identifies the item.
        Returns:
        The block represented by key
        Throws:
        DataException - The block does not exist within the configuration.

      • getOptionalItem

        public DataItem getOptionalItem(java.lang.String key)
        Deprecated. 
        Get an optional item from the configuration.

        Gets the item for the named key, if the item does not exist then a new DataItem with null is returned.

        Parameters:
        key - The key that identifies the item.
        Returns:
        The item represented by key if it exists, otherwise a new DataItem null.

      • getOptionalItem

        public DataItem getOptionalItem(java.lang.String key,
                                java.lang.Object defaultValue)
        Deprecated. 
        Get an optional item from the configuration.

        Gets the item for the named key, if the item does not exist then a new DataItem with the defaultValue is returned.

        Parameters:
        key - The key that identifies the item.
        defaultValue - The default value if the item does not exist.
        Returns:
        The item represented by key if it exists, otherwise a new DataItem with the defaultValue.

      • getOptionalSetting

        public java.lang.String getOptionalSetting(java.lang.String key)
        Deprecated. 
        Get an optional string value from the configuration.

        Gets the value for the named key, if the value does not exist then a null is returned.

        Parameters:
        key - The key that identifies the item.
        Returns:
        The value of the item represented by key or null if it does not exist.

      • getOptionalSetting

        public java.lang.String getOptionalSetting(java.lang.String key,
                                           java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Deprecated. 
        Get an optional string value from the configuration.

        Gets the value for the named key, if the value does not exist then the defaultValue is returned.

        Parameters:
        key - The key that identifies the item.
        defaultValue - The default value if the item does not exist.
        Returns:
        The value of the item represented by key, or defaultValue if it does not exist.

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Deprecated. 
        Get the path of the configuration block

        Gets the value for path based on the root from the parent.

        Returns:
        the path of the configuration block

        Throws:

      • isConfigRead

        public boolean isConfigRead()
        Deprecated. 
        indicates if all the elements have been read.
        Returns:

      • keys

        public java.lang.String[] keys()
                        throws DataException
        Deprecated. 
        Get the list of keys for the configuration block.
        Returns:
        An array containing all the keys.
        Throws:
        DataException - The configuration block is empty.
